languages.text: "На наш корабль напали, Теодора погибла, а я вступил{mf||а} в права наследования. Большего вам знать не надо".
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."
languages.original_text: "На наш корабль напали, Теодора погибла, а я вступил{mf||а} в права наследования. Большего вам знать не надо".

traits.locale_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. This is all you need to know."
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. This is all you need to know."
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."
"Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

languages.text: "Unser Schiff wurde angegriffen, Theodora wurde getötet und ich habe mein Erbe beansprucht. Mehr müsst Ihr nicht wissen."
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Schiff wurde angegriffen, Theodora wurde getötet und ich habe mein Erbe beansprucht. Mehr müsst Ihr nicht wissen."

languages.text: « Notre vaisseau a été attaqué, Théodora s'est fait tuer et j'ai revendiqué mon héritage. C'est tout ce que vous avez besoin de savoir. »
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: « Notre vaisseau a été attaqué, Théodora s'est fait tuer et j'ai revendiqué mon héritage. C'est tout ce que vous avez besoin de savoir. »

languages.text: “我们的船遭到了袭击，西奥多拉不幸遇害，而我成为了新的领袖。这就是你该知道的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: “我们的船遭到了袭击，西奥多拉不幸遇害，而我成为了新的领袖。这就是你该知道的事情。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の船は襲撃されて、シオドーラは殺され、{mf|俺|私}は遺産を手に入れた。これだけ知っていてくれたらいい」
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の船は襲撃されて、シオドーラは殺され、{mf|俺|私}は遺産を手に入れた。これだけ知っていてくれたらいい」

languages.text: «Nuestra nave fue atacada, Theodora fue asesinada, y yo reclamé mi herencia. No necesita saber más».
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra nave fue atacada, Theodora fue asesinada, y yo reclamé mi herencia. No necesita saber más».

languages.text: "Gemimize saldırdılar, Theodora öldürüldü ve ben de hakkım olan mirası aldım. Bilmeniz gerekenler bu kadar."
languages.original_text: "Our ship was attacked, Theodora was killed, and I claimed my inheritance. That is all you need to know."

traits.locale_text: "Gemimize saldırdılar, Theodora öldürüldü ve ben de hakkım olan mirası aldım. Bilmeniz gerekenler bu kadar."
